price: Ani sodaachisaa ifa galaa ta’uu malee beeksifni (biraa) gara kiyya hin godhamu.”
arabic: إِن يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَيَّ إِلَّآ أَنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٌ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: in yūḥā ilayya illā annamā anā nadhīrun mubīnun
